mapper.insert:
insert into ignore_record ( uuid, account_uuid, account_name, level, type, tool, repo_uuid, repo_name, branch, ignore_time, issue_uuid, raw_issue, commit_uuid, tag, message ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.accountUuid}, #{item.accountName}, #{item.level}, #{item.type}, #{item.tool}, #{item.repoUuid}, #{item.repoName}, #{item.branch}, #{item.ignoreTime}, #{item.issueUuid}, #{item.rawIssue}, #{item.commmitUuid}, #{item.tag}, #{item.message} )
